nz.ac.auckland.integration.testing.expectation

Class ContentMockExpectation

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.auckland.integration.testing.expectation.MockExpectation
      • nz.ac.auckland.integration.testing.expectation.ContentMockExpectation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AsyncMockExpectation, SyncMockExpectation

    public abstract class ContentMockExpectation
extends MockExpectation
    An abstract class to set expectations for bodies and headers for an incoming message

    This class carries out the message validation based on the test resource, expectations will be returned in the order specified even if some relaxation of total ordering occurs

    Author:
    David MacDonald

      • checkValid

        public boolean checkValid(org.apache.camel.Exchange incomingExchange,
                 int index)
        Evaluates whether the content coming in from an endpoint meets the content requirements. Ordering checks are delegated to the superclass.
        Overrides:
        checkValid in class MockExpectation
        Returns:
        true if the message has been received in the correct order based on the expected receivedAt value and the ordering requirements.
